content: Any idea who's responsible for the configuration of the TLS certificate for hl7.org? It has a few issues.... https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/analyze.html?d=www.hl7.org&hideResults=on
David is working on upgraded the server - it's an old IIS but upgrading it requires all sorts of application fixes
Good to know. I have tooling that is complaining about the ciphers being used when trying to download files like https://hl7.org/fhir/package-list.json
